title: Witchy Awakening
description: When Jessica Lavender's mother passes away, she's thrown into chaos.Things get even more complicated when her cat starts talking to her and reveals that Jess is a witch and midlife is like some magical switch. Jess must navigate her new identity and unravel the mysteries surrounding the sudden deaths in her small town.With a body in the garden and a town full of suspects, can Jess solve the crimes and uncover the truth? This paranormal cozy mystery will leave you spellbound until the very end.
author: C.A. Phipps
